name: Tumblr - Mute Music Players
description: Removes embedded music players from Tumblr blogs. No more auto-playing songs!

user.name: Sorcerer
user.about:
I just like to change how the web looks.
You're free to modify my styles, just attribute me.
Please email me if any of my styles are broken/out of date so I can fix them.

additional_info: Also try Tumblr - Remove Useless Buttons Email me if you find a blog with music still playing. Also blocks Freehostedscripts, and custom cursors. Icon by Silviu Runceanu
